figure_1.title: Figure 1:
figure_1.caption: Figure represents the odds ratios within each variable (C-reactive protein, fibrinogen, HOMA-IR, and HOMA-B) according to quartile. Figure A represents sarcopenic obesity based on the ALM definition, and Figure B represents sarcopenic obesity based on ALM:BMI.

claims.sentence: A clear inverse and positive relationship between rate of sarcopenia and sarcopenic obesity using both definitions exist for HOMA-IR (Figure 1 and Appendix).

Figure 1:


Open in a new tab
Figure represents the odds ratios within each variable (C-reactive protein, fibrinogen, HOMA-IR, and HOMA-B) according to quartile.
A clear inverse and positive relationship between rate of sarcopenia and sarcopenic obesity using both definitions exist for HOMA-IR (Figure 1 and Appendix).

Figure 1:

Figure represents the odds ratios within each variable (C-reactive protein, fibrinogen, HOMA-IR, and HOMA-B) according to quartile.
A clear inverse and positive relationship between rate of sarcopenia and sarcopenic obesity using both definitions exist for HOMA-IR (Figure 1 and Appendix).
